summary: This is an email exchange between Ted Leopold and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding the Epstein investigation. The AUSA provides contact information and mentions two unnamed individuals who are good friends, while Leopold acknowledges receipt and promises to follow up.

persons.name: Ted Leopold
persons.context: Appears as the sender/recipient in email exchange about the Epstein investigation, indicating he will get back to the AUSA.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: Provides contact information from West Palm Beach, FL, and mentions two unnamed good friends in relation to the Epstein investigation.

connections.description: Communicating via email regarding the Epstein investigation, with Leopold promising to follow up.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein investigation
events.description: Ted Leopold and an Assistant U.S. Attorney exchange emails regarding the Epstein investigation, with the AUSA providing contact information and mentioning two unnamed friends.

keyFacts: Email exchange dated June 30, 2008 regarding the Epstein investigation.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from West Palm Beach provides contact information and mentions two unnamed good friends.
Ted Leopold acknowledges the email and states he will get back to the AUSA.
